sudoku
Class Legals

java.lang.Object
  sudoku.Legals

public class Legals
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Brian Lau Creates a N*N*N matrix that contains booleans. L[i,j,k] is true if an option is allowed on the grid[i,j].

set

public void set(int i,
                int j,
                int notPossible)
Method takes a value at a specific space and makes sure that this value cannot exist more than once in the same row or column

Parameters:
i - Row for the boolean array
j - Column for the boolean array
notPossible - Value to eliminate from other columns and rows

get

public boolean get(int i,
                   int j,
                   int k)
Parameters:
i - The specific row
j - The specific column
k - A possible number for the particular row and column
Returns:
Returns true or false for the value, if true the element is a possible value for the specific space, otherwise it is not a possibility.

countCandidates

                             int j)
Method counts the number of possibilities at a particular row and column

Parameters:
i - The numbered row
j - The numbered column
Returns:
The number of possible values at the specific column and row
